abstract.p: Humorous singer-songwriter Loudon Wainwright, frequent guest on ABC's Nightline, will appear in concert at Community Theater in Morristown, NJ (S)

block.p: Loudon Wainwright, a lyrical commentator on life's funny twists and unhappy turns has earned a reputation as a humorous intellectual.

A singer-songwriter who hones his musical humor on the foibles of humanity, Mr. Wainwright's latest recording, ''Social Studies,'' takes a detour from his highly personal, yet universal insights on family, relationships and aging, to concentrate on more topical issues, like O. J. Simpson, Saddam Hussein, President Clinton and American foreign policy.

Currently appearing in ''28 Days'' with Sandra Bullock, he is also a frequent guest on ABC's ''Nightline.''
Mr. Wainwright will appear at the Community Theater in Morristown on Friday. Tickets are available through Ticketmaster or the theater box office at (973) 539-8008.
